SEARCH
Package org.opensearch.sdk.api

Interface SearchExtension

public interface SearchExtension
Extension for extending search time behavior.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static class 
    SearchExtension.AggregationSpec
    Specification for an Aggregation.
    static class 
    SearchExtension.CompositeAggregationSpec
    Specification for including an aggregation as a part of Composite Aggregation.
    static interface 
    SearchExtension.ExecutorServiceProvider
    Executor service provider
    static class 
    SearchExtension.FetchPhaseConstructionContext
    Context available during fetch phase construction.
    static class

    Specification for a PipelineAggregator.

    Specification of custom Query.

    Specification of custom ScoreFunction.
    static class 
    SearchExtension.SearchExtensionSpec<W extends org.opensearch.common.io.stream.NamedWriteable,P>
    Specification of search time behavior extension like a custom MovAvgModel or ScoreFunction.
    static class 
    SearchExtension.SearchExtSpec<T extends org.opensearch.search.SearchExtBuilder>
    Specification for a SearchExtBuilder which represents an additional section that can be parsed in a search request (within the ext element).

    Specification of custom SignificanceHeuristic.

    Specification for a Suggester.

    Description
    default List<Consumer<org.opensearch.search.aggregations.support.ValuesSourceRegistry.Builder>>
    getAggregationExtentions()
    Allows Extensions to register new aggregations using aggregation names that are already defined in Core, as long as the new aggregations target different ValuesSourceTypes

    getIndexSearcherExecutorProvider()

  • Method Details

    • getScoreFunctions

      default List<SearchExtension.ScoreFunctionSpec<?>> getScoreFunctions()
      The new ScoreFunctions defined by this Extension.

    • getSignificanceHeuristics

      default List<SearchExtension.SignificanceHeuristicSpec<?>> getSignificanceHeuristics()
      The new SignificanceHeuristics defined by this Extension. SignificanceHeuristics are used by the SignificantTerms aggregation to pick which terms are significant for a given query.

    • getMovingAverageModels

      default List<SearchExtension.SearchExtensionSpec<org.opensearch.search.aggregations.pipeline.MovAvgModel,org.opensearch.search.aggregations.pipeline.MovAvgModel.AbstractModelParser>> getMovingAverageModels()
      The new MovAvgModels defined by this Extension. MovAvgModels are used by the MovAvgPipelineAggregator to model trends in data.

    • getFetchSubPhases

      default List<org.opensearch.search.fetch.FetchSubPhase> getFetchSubPhases(SearchExtension.FetchPhaseConstructionContext context)
      The new FetchSubPhases defined by this Extension.
      Parameters:
      context - The context for which to fetch the subphases.

    • getSearchExts

      default List<SearchExtension.SearchExtSpec<?>> getSearchExts()
      The new SearchExtBuilders defined by this Extension.

    • getHighlighters

      default Map<String,org.opensearch.search.fetch.subphase.highlight.Highlighter> getHighlighters()
      Get the Highlighters defined by this Extension.

    • getSuggesters

      default List<SearchExtension.SuggesterSpec<?>> getSuggesters()
      The new Suggesters defined by this Extension.

    • getQueries

      default List<SearchExtension.QuerySpec<?>> getQueries()
      The new Querys defined by this Extension.

    • getSorts

      default List<SearchExtension.SortSpec<?>> getSorts()
      The new Sorts defined by this Extension.

    • getAggregations

      default List<SearchExtension.AggregationSpec> getAggregations()
      The new Aggregations added by this Extension.

    • getAggregationExtentions

      default List<Consumer<org.opensearch.search.aggregations.support.ValuesSourceRegistry.Builder>> getAggregationExtentions()
      Allows Extensions to register new aggregations using aggregation names that are already defined in Core, as long as the new aggregations target different ValuesSourceTypes
      Returns:
      A list of the new registrar functions

    • getCompositeAggregations

      default List<SearchExtension.CompositeAggregationSpec> getCompositeAggregations()
      Allows Extensions to register new Aggregation in the CompositeAggregation.
      Returns:
      A List of SearchExtension.CompositeAggregationSpec

    • getPipelineAggregations

      default List<SearchExtension.PipelineAggregationSpec> getPipelineAggregations()
      The new PipelineAggregators added by this Extension.

    • getRescorers

      default List<SearchExtension.RescorerSpec<?>> getRescorers()
      The new Rescorers added by this Extension.

    • getQueryPhaseSearcher

      default Optional<org.opensearch.search.query.QueryPhaseSearcher> getQueryPhaseSearcher()
      The new QueryPhaseSearcher added by this Extension. At the moment, only one QueryPhaseSearcher is supported per instance, the IllegalStateException is going to be thrown if more then one Extension tries to register QueryPhaseSearcher implementation.

    • getIndexSearcherExecutorProvider

      default Optional<SearchExtension.ExecutorServiceProvider> getIndexSearcherExecutorProvider()
      The executor service provider (registered through Extension.getExecutorBuilders(Settings) to be used at search time by IndexSearcher. The IllegalStateException is going to be thrown if more then one plugin tries to register index searcher executor.
